description: Trees in Gulf Islands National Park Reserve need to be removed to ensure public safety. Parks Canada requires an experienced contractor to provide tree services in the reserve. The contractor shall perform and complete the work no later than October 31, 2025.
full_summary:
================================*****
Table of Contents
-----------------

* [Notice of Proposed Procurement](#notice)
* [Contract Description](#Contract)
* [Bidding Instructions](#Bidding-Instructions)
* [Awarding and Contract Costs](#Award-and-Contract-Costs)
* [Contract Timeline](#Contract-Timeline)
* [Contact Information](#Contact)

<a name="notice"/>

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

This notice is hereby issued to announce a solicitation for the provision of tree removal services in the Gulf Islands National Park Reserve. The Government of Canada is seeking experienced contractors to provide these essential services in accordance with the provisions outlined below.

<a name="Contract"/>

### Contract Description

The successful contractor will provide tree removal services for the duration of the contract period, which extends until October 31, 2025. This contract falls under the category of SRV, reflecting the need for skilled service providers in this area.

<a name="Bidding-Instructions"/>

### Bidding Instructions

To submit a bid, interested contractors should obtain the solicitation documents from the Government of Canada's tendering service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). Addenda will be available from the same source. Bidders must submit their bids via email (to soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca) or fax (to 1-866-246-6893). 

No late submissions will be considered. The size of the email file should not exceed 15 MB. It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure that their email is not too large and that it is sent in acceptable format. Please find the locations provided below for the tender notice:

- English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41259/5p420-23-0387a-rfq.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41259/5p420-23-0387a-rfq.pdf)
- French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41259/5p420-23-0387a-ddp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41259/5p420-23-0387a-ddp.pdf)


<a name="Award-and-Contract-Costs"/>

### Award
